name: Washbucklers
description:
Washbucklers is a 2v2, nautical themed party game which pits two teams of pirates against each other, battling for naval superiority in an all-out ecological warfare.

Sully the enemy's ship with your garbage cannon, swab your ship's deck with your mop, wreak havoc on the enemy's ship and steal their supplies to gain the upper hand on the perilous seas of Washbucklers!

Xbox controllers or equivalents required. Local multiplayer only, although some programs like Parsec may be used to allow remote multiplayer.

Engine and game developed by Jampacked Interactive during our second year studying game development at UOIT.
